response:
"wovon ich noch sprechen kann, ist mir lieber, als von meinen daten zu schweigen. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "i'd rather talk about it than keep my data private. #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critiques the idea that personal information should be protected at all costs, suggesting that open communication and transparency are more important than keeping personal information private. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) indicate that the post is related to these topics.
